Name: Ziggy's Chase
About the game: Never mind the plumber, the hedgehog is coming to Steam! THE GAME FEATURES CLASSIC GAMEPLAY, AND VR MODE AS WELL. Synopsis Ziggy the hedgehog is living an interesting life on a golf course, but various naughty creatures want to spoil all the fun. Help Ziggy to avoid the obstacles, retrieve all of his golf equipment, and safely roll a ball down a golf hole. The game Ziggy's Chase is a 3D platformer with colorful graphics and multitude of obstacles and enemies. You can run, jump and shoot, and also use some other kinds of transportation like boat or a seesaw. It has the visual vibe of some older console games, but with many new tweaks and perks. THE GAME FEATURES CLASSIC GAMEPLAY, AND VR MODE AS WELL. Key features enjoy rich cartoon graphics fight or avoid odd creatures and machines that invaded your golf course pick up goodies for foodies to achieve better score use platforms, seesaws and boats to reach remote parts of the island use hidden contraptions to open doors groove to the original funky music 30 levels of pure fun
